item.title: Thinking in SQL with Django
item.description:
Description

"Thinking in SQL with Django" by Joseph Victor Zammit at Django Day Copenhagen 2022. Talk description at: https://2022.djangoday.dk/talks/joseph/

Camera audio/video is lost at 3:00 but comes back at 4:14! What happens in that time is:

  • more details about the Lindy Effect, which Nassim Nicholas Taleb has a great essay on: https://medium.com/incerto/an-expert-called-lindy-fdb30f146eaf
  • speaker gives roadmap of what will happen in talk, by following Django's docs recommendations on performance here: https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/topics/db/optimization/

Hope this helps!
item.dc:creator: Joseph Victor Zammit
